Package com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.module

Classes for representing and managing modules in the user's code.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ModuleContextRepresentation Representation of a module context in the user's code.
ModuleManager Responsible for tracking the modules which should be run when resolving bindings and injections.
ModuleRepresentation Representation of a module context in the user's code.
ModuleSelectionView Interface for IDE specific objects presenting the module choices to the user.
ModulesListener Responsible for listening to changes in the user's code involving Modules.
 

Class Summary
ModuleContextRepresentationImpl Standard implementation of the ModuleContextRepresentation.
ModuleInstanceRepresentation Representation of an instance of a Module in the user's code, including which constructor to use and how to use it.
ModuleManagerImpl The standard implementation of the ModuleManager.
ModuleRepresentationImpl Represents a single module in the module context.
 

Exception Summary
ModuleManager.NoProjectException  
 

Package com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.module Description

Classes for representing and managing modules in the user's code.

Modules in the user's code are managed by the ModuleManager which is injected as a singleton. The ModuleSelectionView and ModulesListener interfaces must be implemented by IDE specific classes to notify the manager of changes in the user's code and configuration.

Modules are represented by the ModuleRepresentation class and module contexts, i.e. guice contexts that injectors are created in are represented by ModuleContextRepresentation. ModuleRepresentations are created for each module in the user's code. ModuleContextRepresentations are created for each context the user specifies to use the plugin for.
